sentences.en: Avoid: Regret to loiter, bewilder to busy unpromising.
sentences.cn: 自我避免: 因虚度年华而悔恨, 因碌碌无为而迷茫!
好啦,别磨蹭啦, 孩子.

sentences.en: Come as you are; do not loiter over your toilet.
sentences.cn: 象你是的来, 不要空闲着,在你的马桶上.

sentences.en: Don't loiter on the way home!
sentences.cn: 不要在回家的路上闲逛!

sentences.en: Don't loiter on your way home from school.
sentences.cn: 不可在放学回家的路上闲逛.

sentences.en: Five or six teenagers were loitering in front of the newsagent’s.
sentences.cn: 五六个青少年在报摊前面游荡。

sentences.en: One should not loiter his time away.
Please do not loiter in one street after school.
sentences.cn: 放学后,请不要在街头徘徊.

sentences.en: Please do not loiter in the streets.
The teacher told the students not to loiter their time away.
sentences.cn: 老师告诉学生不要虚度光阴.

sentences.en: Unemployed young men loiter at the entrance of the factory.
sentences.cn: 失业的小年轻在工厂门口游荡。

sentences.en: We must not loiter or we will be late for school.
sentences.cn: 我们不能闲逛,否则会迟到.

sentences.en: We would as soon go to a film than loiter about here.
sentences.cn: 我们与其在这儿闲逛,不如去看电影.

sentences.en: We'll be left behind if we loiter.
sentences.cn: 我们如果游荡,就会落后了.

sentences.en: You should not loiter your time away.

phrases.tran_cn: (英格兰律 旧)恶意逗留，伺机袭击

trans.tran_cn: 闲荡, 虚度, 徘徊
trans.tran_en: to stand or wait somewhere, especially in a public place, without any clear reason

trans.tran_cn: （在公共场所）走走停停，闲逛，游荡，磨蹭
